channel.title: Comments on: WOS3: hack-attack
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: aaron wall
item.dc:creator: aaron wall
item.description: it is always good to see both sides of the coin :)
item.content:encoded: it is always good to see both sides of the coin ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Adam Wern
item.dc:creator: Adam Wern
item.description:
I am really sorry for the problems our "marketing"/hacking department created. They got a bit too excited hyping the dotcom. I wasn't too happy about it either, it was fun the first 5 minutes but then got out of hand, my Firebird Google bar sent me to this lousy designed interface of ours.
My problem was that everything got out of control, the designers created strange art, the slashdot crowd spammed (!) my paypal account with money, my email inbox was flooded with questions and job applications, so I really had a hard time controlling things.
I am really sorry, I didn't want to the abuse power like we did. The WOS3 conference covers really important things so it shouldn't be taken too lightly.
/ Adam Wern 24hdc.com
item.content:encoded:
I am really sorry for the problems our “marketing”/hacking department created. They got a bit too excited hyping the dotcom. I wasn’t too happy about it either, it was fun the first 5 minutes but then got out of hand, my Firebird Google bar sent me to this lousy designed interface of ours.

My problem was that everything got out of control, the designers created strange art, the slashdot crowd spammed (!) my paypal account with money, my email inbox was flooded with questions and job applications, so I really had a hard time controlling things.

I am really sorry, I didn’t want to the abuse power like we did. The WOS3 conference covers really important things so it shouldn’t be taken too lightly.

/ Adam Wern
24hdc.com

item.title: By: SEO Book.com
item.dc:creator: SEO Book.com
item.description:
<strong>Dozomo Meta Search Engine - a 24 Hour Wizards of Oz Production</strong>
Dozomo is a new meta search engine that was created at the Wizard of Oz conference. Dozomo was created in 24 hours and is being sold on eBay to the highest bidder.
item.content:encoded:
Dozomo Meta Search Engine – a 24 Hour Wizards of Oz Production

Dozomo is a new meta search engine that was created at the Wizard of Oz conference. Dozomo was created in 24 hours and is being sold on eBay to the highest bidder.
